page.title: Thank You So Much For Playing!
page.text: Everything in this mod was made by (!bold/(!gradient/#2CFF88/#1ECD62/RagDeWann)). I really hope you enjoy this mod! (!emoji/emoji_ragheart.png)(!line)(!line) You can check out my (!color/#FF0035/(!bold/Youtube channel)) if you want more content from me,(!line) And my (!color/#F79000/(!bold/Scratch projects)) to see my past Incredibox projects!(!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line) (!button/#1ECD62/social_youtube.png/https://www.youtube.com/@RagTheOne721//My Channel) (!button/#F9AA39/social_scratch.png/https://scratch.mit.edu/users/RagDeWann//My Scratch Profile)

page.title: Support the original creator!
page.text: This mod was based off (!bold/Sprunki), an Incredibox fangame made by (!color/#0094ff/(!bold/NyankoBf))! (!line)(!line) I recommend you to go play his other (!bold/Incredibox) projects,(!line) And check out his (!color/#FF0035/(!bold/Youtube channel)) for his fangame's links(!line)and for any news about his fangames! (!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line) (!button/#0094FF/social_youtube.png/https://www.youtube.com/@nyankobflol22//Nyanko's Channel)

page.title: Special Thanks!
page.text: Credits to (!color/#8162CC/(!bold/GegeRange)) for making this mod's mobile port! (!line) We've also created some Incredibox mods together, so make sure to check out his stuff! (!line)(!line) (!button/#8162CC/social_youtube.png/https://www.youtube.com/@GegsPunchLine//Gegs' Channel) (!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line) And credits to (!color/#64b1e8/(!bold/Rem)) for this wonderful (!bold/Incredibox modding template)!(!line)(And also helping me with some coding) (!line) Please go support and explore her stuff she did for the Incredibox community! (!line)(!line) (!button/#64b1e8/social_youtube.png/https://www.youtube.com/@rin.Incredibox//Rem's Channel) (!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line) (!bold/OTHER CREDITS :) (!line)(!line)Credits to these people that I used designs from their own(!line)Sprunki spin-offs in Bonus 1! (in order); (!line)(!line) (!emoji/emoji_draker.png) (!color/#FFAF00/(!bold/Draker) :) Sprunked, Sprunki 1996 (!line) (!emoji/emoji_coolskull212.png) (!color/#5B5B5B/(!bold/CoolSkull212) :) Sprunki Retake (!line) (!emoji/emoji_pyraminx.png) (!color/#B200FF/(!bold/Pyraminx) :) Sprunki Pyraminxed (!line)(!line) Credits to (!color/#0094ff/(!bold/BonBonnet)) for letting me use his skeleton template, (!line) And (!gradient/#CCAE00/#105A21/(!bold/Rizsim Studios)) for extra help on coding!

page.title: INCREDIBOX BY SO FAR SO GOOD!
page.text: And of course, this is a mod of Incredibox, a game by (!bold/SO FAR SO GOOD)!(!line)Without them, this project wouldn't exist! (even Sprunki woudn't exist,,, ohmyjod..,.)(!line)(!line) Learn more about (!bold/Incredibox) and purchase the original game! (!line)(!line) (!button/#4A4A4A/sfsg-credits-button.png/https://www.incredibox.com//Incredibox Website)(!button/#4A4A4A/sfsg-credits-button.png/https://www.incredibox.com/info/store/Buy Incredibox)(!line)(!line)(!youtube/https://youtu.be/eMdLqaeWP-k?si=qVIW_g34Xo2Uin_I) (!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line) You can also learn more about the people behind (!bold/SO FAR SO GOOD) by visiting their website! (!line)(!line) (!button/#000000/sfsg-website.png/https://www.sofarsogood.fr//So Far So Good's Website)(!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line)Pump it up and chill!
